/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.sales.order.impl.HcOrderRegisterMapper.selectHcProductCodeList */ SELECT STK_ID , C1 , CODE_NAME FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT T1.STK_ID , T1.STK_CODE ||' - '||T1.STK_DESC C1 , CASE WHEN T2.DISCONTINUE = '1' THEN T3.CODE_NAME ||' ('||T5.CODE_NAME||')' ELSE T3.CODE_NAME END CODE_NAME , T2.DISCONTINUE
FROM SYS0026M T1 /* InvStock */ , SAL0082D T2 /* ServiceContractPackage_Product */ , SYS0013M T3 /* CodeDetail */ , SYS0013M T5 /* CodeDetail */ WHERE T1.STK_ID = T2.SRV_PAC_ITM_PRODUCT_ID AND T1.STK_CTGRY_ID = T3.CODE_ID AND 1 = T2.SRV_PAC_ITM_STUS_ID AND 61 = T1.STK_TYPE_ID AND T2.SRV_CNTRCT_PAC_ID = #{srvPacId} AND TO_CHAR(T2.DISCONTINUE) = T5.CODE AND T5.CODE_MASTER_ID = '381'
AND T3.CODE != 'FRM' AND T3.CODE != 'ACO'
AND (T3.CODE = 'FRM' OR T3.CODE = 'ACO')
SELECT DISTINCT T1.STK_ID , T1.STK_CODE ||' - '||T1.STK_DESC C1 , CASE WHEN T2.DISCONTINUE = '1' THEN T3.CODE_NAME ||' ('||T5.CODE_NAME||')' ELSE T3.CODE_NAME END CODE_NAME , T2.DISCONTINUE
FROM SYS0026M T1 /* InvStock */ , SAL0092M T2 /* SrvMembershipPacD */ , SYS0013M T3 /* CodeDetail */ , SAL0016M T4 /* SalesPrice */ , SYS0013M T5 /* CodeDetail */
WHERE T1.STK_ID = T2.SRV_MEM_ITM_STK_ID AND T1.STK_CTGRY_ID = T3.CODE_ID AND 1 = T2.SRV_MEM_ITM_STUS_ID AND 61 = T1.STK_TYPE_ID AND T2.SRV_MEM_PAC_ID = #{srvPacId} AND TO_CHAR(T2.DISCONTINUE) = T5.CODE AND T5.CODE_MASTER_ID = '381'
AND T3.CODE != 'FRM' AND T3.CODE != 'ACO'
AND (T3.CODE = 'FRM' OR T3.CODE = 'ACO')
) A
LEFT JOIN SYS0098M POSTCODE_BLOCK ON POSTCODE_BLOCK.PARAM_VAL = #{postcode} AND POSTCODE_BLOCK.MODULE = 'SALES' AND POSTCODE_BLOCK.SUB_MODULE = 'KEYIN_BLOCK' AND POSTCODE_BLOCK.PARAM_CODE = 'POSTCODE' LEFT JOIN SYS0098M STK_ID_BLOCK ON STK_ID_BLOCK.PARAM_VAL = TO_CHAR(A.STK_ID) AND STK_ID_BLOCK.MODULE = 'SALES' AND STK_ID_BLOCK.SUB_MODULE = 'KEYIN_BLOCK' AND STK_ID_BLOCK.PARAM_CODE = 'STK_ID' WHERE POSTCODE_BLOCK.SEQ IS NULL OR STK_ID_BLOCK.SEQ IS NULL
ORDER BY DISCONTINUE, CODE_NAME ASC, STK_ID ASC

/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.sales.order.impl.HcOrderRegisterMapper.getBndlNo */ SELECT 'SB' || LPAD(#{ordSeqNo}, 8, '0') FROM DUAL
/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.sales.order.impl.HcOrderRegisterMapper.getProductSize */ SELECT STK_SIZE FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = #{product}

/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.sales.order.impl.HcOrderRegisterMapper.selectPromotionByFrame */ SELECT DISTINCT T2.PROMO_ID CODE , T2.PROMO_CODE || '-' || T2.PROMO_DESC CODE_NAME FROM SAL0018D T1 JOIN SAL0017D T2 ON T2.PROMO_ID = T1.PROMO_ID WHERE T2.PROMO_ID = 31723
/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.sales.order.impl.HcOrderRegisterMapper.getCountHcPreOrder */ SELECT COUNT(ORD_SEQ_NO) FROM HMC0011D WHERE ORD_SEQ_NO = #{ordSeqNo}
SELECT COUNT(BNDL_ID) FROM API0005D WHERE BNDL_ID = #{bndlId}
SELECT A.ORD_SEQ_NO FROM HMC0011D A JOIN SAL0001D B ON A.ORD_SEQ_NO = B.BNDL_ID JOIN API0005D C ON C.ECOMM_ORD_ID = B.ECOMM_ORD_ID AND B.SALES_ORD_ID = C.SALES_ORD_ID WHERE C.BNDL_ID = #{bndlId}
SELECT SALES_ORD_ID FROM API0005D WHERE BNDL_ID = #{ecommBndlId} AND ECOMM_ORD_ID != #{ecommOrdId}
/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.sales.order.impl.HcOrderRegisterMapper.getProductCategory */ SELECT STK_CTGRY_ID FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = #{product}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT Y.ORD_NO, Z.MAIN_ORD_ID, Y.REF_NO, Y.ORD_DT, Y.APP_TYPE, Y.PROD, Y.PROMO_CDE, Y.CUST_ID, Y.SO_REQ_ID, Y.SO_REQ_STUS_ID FROM SAL0349D Z LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT A.SALES_ORD_NO AS ORD_NO, A.SALES_ORD_ID AS ORD_ID, A.REF_NO AS REF_NO, TO_CHAR(A.SALES_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ORD_DT, G.CODE AS APP_TYPE, D.STK_DESC AS PROD, E.PROMO_CODE AS PROMO_CDE, F.NAME AS CUST_ID, C.SO_REQ_ID, C.SO_REQ_STUS_ID FROM SAL0001D A JOIN ( SELECT PROD_CDE, PROMO_ID FROM SAL0252M WHERE CONF_ID IN ( SELECT CONF_ID FROM SAL0253D WHERE SUB_PROMO_ID IN ( SELECT PROMO_ID FROM SAL0001D WHERE PCKAGE_BINDING_NO = #{ordIdPop_1} AND CUST_ID = #{custId} ) ) ) B ON A.PROMO_ID = B.PROMO_ID AND A.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND STUS_CODE_ID <> 10 LEFT JOIN SAL0020D C ON C.SO_REQ_SO_ID = A.SALES_ORD_ID AND C.SO_REQ_ID = FN_GET_SAL0020D_MAX_ID(A.SALES_ORD_ID, '1') JOIN SAL0002D H ON A.SALES_ORD_ID = H.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SYS0026M D ON H.ITM_STK_ID = D.STK_ID JOIN SAL0017D E ON A.PROMO_ID = E.PROMO_ID JOIN SAL0029D F ON A.CUST_ID = F.CUST_ID JOIN SYS0013M G ON G.CODE_MASTER_ID = '10' AND A.APP_TYPE_ID = G.CODE_ID WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID NOT IN ( SELECT A.SALES_ORD_ID FROM SAL0001D A JOIN SAL0001D B ON A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.PCKAGE_BINDING_NO WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND A.STUS_CODE_ID <> 10 AND A.PROMO_ID IN ( SELECT PROMO_ID FROM SAL0252M WHERE CONF_ID IN ( SELECT CONF_ID FROM SAL0253D WHERE SUB_PROMO_ID IN ( SELECT PROMO_ID FROM SAL0001D WHERE PCKAGE_BINDING_NO = #{ordIdPop_1} AND CUST_ID = 31 ) ) ) ) )Y ON Y.ORD_ID = Z.MAIN_ORD_ID ) WHERE (SO_REQ_ID IS NULL OR (SO_REQ_ID IS NOT NULL AND SO_REQ_STUS_ID = 31))

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(MAX_QTY) FROM SAL0253D WHERE SUB_PROD_ID = #{prod}) = PROD_MAX_LINK THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS MAX_QTY FROM SAL0252M WHERE DISB = 0 AND PROD_CDE = #{prod} AND PROMO_ID = #{promoNo} AND PROD_CAT = 'ACI'
UNION
SELECT MAX_QTY FROM SAL0253D WHERE SUB_PROMO_ID = #{promoNo} AND SUB_PROD_ID = #{prod} AND SUB_PROD_CAT = 'ACI' AND DISB = 0 )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAL0349D A JOIN SAL0001D B ON B.SALES_ORD_ID = A.SUB_ORD_ID AND B.CUST_ID = #{custId} JOIN SAL0002D C ON C.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID WHERE A.MAIN_ORD_ID = #{ordId} AND A.DISB = 0 GROUP BY A.MAIN_ORD_ID

SELECT A.SUB_ORD_ID AS ORD_ID, B.SALES_ORD_NO AS ORD_NO, A.COMBO_GRP, G.CODE AS APP_TYPE, D.STK_DESC AS PROD, E.PROMO_CODE AS PROMO_CDE, TO_CHAR(B.SALES_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ORD_DT, H.CODE AS ORDER_STATUS, B.NOR_RNT_FEE AS ORIGINAL_NOR_RNT_FEE FROM SAL0349D A JOIN SAL0001D B ON B.SALES_ORD_ID = A.SUB_ORD_ID AND B.CUST_ID = #{custId} JOIN SAL0002D C ON C.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SYS0026M D ON C.ITM_STK_ID = D.STK_ID JOIN SAL0017D E ON B.PROMO_ID = E.PROMO_ID JOIN SAL0029D F ON B.CUST_ID = F.CUST_ID JOIN SYS0013M G ON G.CODE_MASTER_ID = '10' AND B.APP_TYPE_ID = G.CODE_ID JOIN SYS0038M H ON H.STUS_CODE_ID = B.STUS_CODE_ID WHERE A.MAIN_ORD_ID = #{ordId} AND A.DISB = 0
AND A.SUB_ORD_ID = #{subOrdId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT A.SUB_ORD_ID AS SUB_ORD_ID, B.SALES_ORD_NO, B.NOR_RNT_FEE AS ORIGINAL_FEE, B.STUS_CODE_ID FROM SAL0349D A JOIN SAL0001D B ON B.SALES_ORD_ID = A.SUB_ORD_ID JOIN SAL0002D C ON C.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID WHERE A.MAIN_ORD_ID = #{ordId} AND A.DISB = 0 AND B.STUS_CODE_ID = '4' AND A.CHG_SEQ >= 1 AND B.CUST_ID = #{custId} )
